Package order.management

Interface IOrder

  • public interface IOrder

    Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
    Politécnico do Porto (PP)
    Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
    Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
    Paradigmas de Programação (PP)
    2019 / 2020

    Contract representing the Order behaviour

    Authors:

    • @author Ricardo Santos
    • @author Bruno Oliveira
    • @author Fábio Silva
    • @author João Ramos
    • @author Óscar Oliveira

      • add

        boolean add​(IItem item)
     throws OrderException
        Adds a new Item to the container
        Parameters:
        item - item to be added
        Returns:
        1. true if the item is inserted.
        2. false if the item already exists in the container
        Throws:
        OrderException - if item is null

      • getShippings

        IShipping[] getShippings()
        Get a copy of the shippings from the order
        Returns:
        shipping details from the order

      • addShipping

        boolean addShipping​(IShipping shipping)
             throws OrderException
        Add a shipping to the order
        Parameters:
        shipping - shipping details
        Returns:
        1. true if the shipping is inserted in the order. The number of shippings should limited to the number defined for each order
        2. false if there isn't more space in the order
        Throws:
        OrderException - if the order is closed or if @param shipping is null

      • removeShipping

        boolean removeShipping​(IShipping shipping)
                throws OrderException
        Remove a shipping from the order
        Parameters:
        shipping - shipping details
        Returns:
        1. true if the shipping is removed in the order.
        2. false if the shipping doesn't exist
        Throws:
        OrderException - if the order is closed or if @param shipping is null

      • clean

        int clean()
        Remove all cancelled shippings from the order
        Returns:
        Returns the number of cancelled shippings

      • validate

        void validate()
       throws OrderException,
              ContainerException,
              PositionException
        Validate if all containers are valid, if all items are placed inside containers, and if the same item is not placed inside multiple containers.
        Throws:
        OrderException - if items are not placed into containers, and if the same item is placed inside multiple containers
        ContainerException - if the volume greater than the current volume
        PositionException - if some item is outside (or is overflowing) the container or if some item is overlapping with other item

      • close

        void close()
    throws OrderException,
           ContainerException,
           PositionException
        Close the order. Before closing a validation procedure is performed. And, verifies if all items were RECEIVED by the destination. The shippings not RECEIVED must be CANCELLED.
        Throws:
        OrderException - if items are not placed into containers, and if the same item is placed inside multiple containers
        ContainerException - if the volume greater than the current volume
        PositionException - if some item is outside (or is overflowing) the container or if some item is overlapping with other item

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Return the closed status of the order
        Returns:
        true if the order is closed, false if the order is not closed

      • getCost

        double getCost()
        Returns the order cost as the sum of the RECEIVED shipping orders costs
        Returns:
        Returns the cost

      • summary

        java.lang.String summary()
        Returns a string representation with a summary of all information relative to this order
        Returns:
        a string representation with a summary

      • getNumberOfItems

        int getNumberOfItems()
        Returns the number of items of the order
        Returns:
        Returns the number of items

      • getNumberOfRemaingItemsToSend

        int getNumberOfRemaingItemsToSend()
        Returns the number of items of the order that are not been sent (i.e. status different from ShipmentStatus.SHIPPED or ShipmentStatus.RECEIVED) or the item is not placed for {@link IShipping shipping}
        Returns:
        the number of items of the order that are not been sent

      • getRemainingItemsToSend

        IItem[] getRemainingItemsToSend()
        Getter for a collection of items of the order that are not been sent (i.e. status different from ShipmentStatus.SHIPPED or ShipmentStatus.RECEIVED) or the item is not placed for {@link IShipping shipping}
        Returns:
        items were not sent
